config.name: dataVolume.deleteOnVmDestroy
config.description: A boolean value indicating whether deleting attached data volumes when destroying a vm. If false, the data volume will be detached and be retained in primary storage

config.name: instanceOffering.setNullWhenDeleting
config.description: whether update instance offering column of VM inventory to NULL when the instance offering is deleted

config.name: deletionPolicy
config.description: the behavior of deleting a vm, options are [Direct, Delay, Never]. Direct: delete the vm from database and directly delete its root volume; Delay: change the vm's state to Destroyed in database; after the period controlled by 'expungePeriod' passes, delete the vm from database and delete it's root volume; Never: delete the vm from database but never delete its root volume

config.name: expungePeriod
config.description: the period before a destroyed vm being deleted from database and before its root volume being deleted from primary storage, in seconds

config.name: expungeInterval
config.description: the interval the expunging vm task runs, in seconds

config.name: cleanTraffic
config.description: switch for clean spoofing traffic from vm

config.name: multivNic.support
config.description: A boolean value indicating whether support to create more than one nics with a L3 network in the a VM. If false, there only no more than one nic can be created for a VM with a L3 Netowrk

config.name: spiceStreamingMode
config.description: config vm streaming mode when use spice

config.name: videoType
config.description: video type for VM. "cirrus" supply basic video type, the resolution is not high. "vga" supply more high resolution for VM. "qxl" supply high performance when use SPICE protocal. Options:[vga, cirrus, qxl]
